name: Rubiks Cube-Magic Cube 3D Game
description:
Rubiks cube game is the best way to pass time & Keep your head clear.

Rubki's Cube craze is back, with a world record of 5.5 seconds, can you break it? Is the general Rubki's Cube no longer challenging? Then try the triangular or the pentagon. Finish the game, enter the leaderboard, and compare with the players around the world, see who is faster. Share your game results with your friends and show them your intelligence and speed.

Game features:
1.” A variety of Rubki's Cube”, there are not only common 2x2, 3x3, 4x4 cubes in the game, but also triangular and square mixed cubes, and pentagon and so on. A variety of Rubki's Cube, unique shape. People who like to play Rubki's Cube must not miss it.
2.” Ranking list”, Finish the game and enter the list. Compare with other players, see who is faster.
3.” Share the results”, 30 seconds? 20 seconds? You’ll never know when you will achieve the highest score. Share your achievements with your friends, let them worship your achievements, and also participate in the game to experience the fun.

The cube, also known as the Rubki's Cube, was first invented in 1974 by professor Erno Magical of the Budapest school of architecture in Hungary, it is an extreme sport of the hand. Rubki's Cube, Hua-Rong-Dao, Peg Solitaire, the three incredible things that foreign intelligence experts call intellectual gaming. The popularity of Rubki's Cube is also a miracle in the intellectual game world.
publishers: Chengdu jiuzhou image information technology co
